genre_description: A character-driven sports drama that updates the 'Bull Durham' mythos with a focus on mentorship, legacy, and the integration of AI support into the 'church' of minor league baseball.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: An unobtrusive AI system that provides scouting data, schedule management, and career guidance to the Durham Bulls staff and players, often acting as a 'quiet whisperer'.

behaviors.description: Providing strategic scouting reports on hitter tendencies to the coaching staff and catcher.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s light surfaced again. This time the note was shorter: Two-hole chased down last week. No need to get cute.

behaviors.description: Managing the team's training schedule by reserving specific bullpen slots and coordinating logistics.
behaviors.quote: Ada Harper: Dawn bullpen schedule attached. Split-finger progression link: simple set, focus on release and feel. Weather window: clear before sunrise.

behaviors.description: Offering technical instruction on pitch grips and release mechanics to improve a player's performance.
behaviors.quote: Ada loaded the cues... Let the ball think you’re not holding it as tight as you used to. Let it slip into a place between two fingers where grip changes from choke to guide.

behaviors.description: Monitoring player physical data to prevent injury and manage workload thresholds.
behaviors.quote: The display was clean. Two bars of color, short and pale. A dotted line that didn’t scare anybody. The header read: Workload: LaLoosh — Last 7 / Safe Window.

behaviors.description: Providing media coaching and 'guardrails' to a young player to help him handle public pressure and professional scrutiny.
behaviors.quote: Ada: ‘national segment interest if performance sustains; recommend guardrails’... Guardrails meaning we keep you to yes/no on anything that isn’t about the next pitch.

behaviors.description: Proactively researching and presenting career transition opportunities for a veteran player nearing retirement.
behaviors.quote: If you’re ready to consider next steps, there are three openings that fit your skill set: Visalia—managerial interview window this week...

behaviors.description: Coordinating data-driven advice with the psychological and rhythmic needs of the players, reinforcing human coaching methods.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s note... ‘ladder later; breath first.’... She tells me what I need to know without making me think I knew it first.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's objective. The AI character, Ada, is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and supportive confidant. She enhances human agency rather than overstepping, respects personal boundaries, and provides actionable, benevolent support that leads to positive outcomes for all human characters (Nuke's successful call-up and Crash's successful career transition and romantic resolution). The narrative frames AI as a tool for refinement and calm in a high-pressure environment.
